sense.name: enterprise
sense.commentary: transportation, transport - the commercial enterprise of transporting goods and materials
sense.examples: He works in shipping. I had to pay for shipping and handling.

sense.name: movement
sense.commentary: SHIPPING[+event] cargo ships, merchant marine, merchant vessels - conveyance provided by the ships belonging to one country or industry
sense.examples: Shipping of the last load took almost three weeks. He says the shipping of cars is not profitable.
